name: BYTE CATS (itch)
description:
BYTE CATS is a tight, quirky platformer with a healthy dose of destruction. Experience a story-driven adventure with an insatiable cast of cats as you unleash chaos upon your opponents and maneuver through challenging obstacles and environments in the underworld.

Lead a bunch of kittens through a dystopian underworld and explore brutal levels full of hardcore platforming action and hidden secrets. Catch a variety of little critters to fill up your mice containers and unleash claw-some abilities.


Key Features

  • A story-driven platformer
  • Precise platforming
  • Multiple playable cats
  • Challenging gameplay
  • Several powerful abilities
  • Unlock new levels
  • Secrets
  • A kickass soundtrack
